network_warning_message: Unable to connect to the server at {relay}. The server may be offline or unreachable, but you can still try to join the circle. Do you want to continue?
user_cancelled_network_issues: User cancelled due to network connectivity issues
invalid_relay_url_no_host: Invalid relay URL: cannot extract host
hint_dont_know_what_to_input: Don't know what to input? Try:
circle_intro_content_1: A Circle is a communication space built around a Nostr relay server. Think of it as your own private communication network.
circle_intro_content_2: Each Circle operates independently with its own relay server, providing you with decentralized and censorship-resistant communication.
circle_intro_feature_1_desc: Your messages are encrypted and routed through your chosen relay
circle_intro_feature_2_desc: No central authority controls your communication
circle_intro_feature_3_desc: Each Circle can host its own community of users
circle_intro_feature_4_desc: Switch between different Circles or create your own
circle_intro_how_step_3: 3. The app will connect to the relay and create your Circle
circle_intro_note: Note: Each Circle is independent. Your contacts and messages in one Circle won't appear in another.
